circumstances: While cruising at a relative low altitude, the twin engine airplane entered a series of hazardous manoeuvres when control was lost. The airplane crashed near Brick Township and was totally destroyed. All six occupants were killed.
probable_cause:
The pilot exceeded the designed stress limits of the aircraft. The following factors were reported:
- Pilot's physical impairment,
- Alcoholic impairment of efficiency and judgment, 
- Separation in flight, 
- Overload failure, 
- Pilot alcohol level 1,05‰ tissue fluid, 
- In-flight separation of wings and tail after a series of steep dives and pull-ups.
